info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 10:05AM CDT by NWS Paducah KY
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri...
St. Francis River at Fisk
.Water releases from Lake Wappapello will cause the St. Francis River at Fisk to rise into minor flood stage this weekend. The river is forecast to reach minor flood stage Saturday morning and crest near 21.0 feet by Monday morning and then hold near that level until further notice.
For the St. Francis River...including Fisk...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...St. Francis River at Fisk.
* WHEN...From Saturday evening until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Considerable flooding occurs.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 12.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Saturday evening and continue rising to 21.0 feet Monday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
